h3.div: The Crosscreek Charter School Board of Directors' Special Called Board Meeting by Zoom on Friday, April 17 at 6:00pm has been cancelled.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Welcome to home-based learning at CCS!

Remote Home- Based Learning from this website will begin Tuesday, April 14. Online instruction will be delivered through each teacher's classroom website. Classroom websites can be accessed from here.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.a: 5 Tips for Parents Balancing Screen Time During School Closures

h3.div: We do look forward to students returning to the classrooms on Monday, May 18, 2020.
